name: Grappling Hook (itch) (ZacFierce)
description:
Using your grappling hook, collect all 30 coins as fast as you can! Try for the lowest time you can!

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys or WASD to move
  • Left click to fire/release grappling hook
  • Spacebar to jump
  • F5 to restart

Created in 2 hours for Game-U LIVE. Watch the recording here!
